argument.definition.flag

Class FlagArgumentDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • argument.definition.ArgumentDefinition
      • argument.definition.flag.FlagArgumentDefinition

  • public class FlagArgumentDefinition
extends ArgumentDefinition
    Argument definition for an flag argument definition.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Steven Cybinski

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlagArgumentDefinition

        public FlagArgumentDefinition(java.lang.String[] prefixes,
                              java.lang.String description,
                              java.lang.Boolean required,
                              java.lang.Boolean defaultValue)
        Constructor of the Class.
        Parameters:
        prefixes - Set prefixes that can be used to get help. E.g. "-flag, -f".
        description - Add a description to this argument like "IP of the target server.".
        required - Determine whether this argument is required.
        defaultValue - What should be the default value, if this argument is not set by the user.

        Return the rules for this argument definition.
        Overrides:
